mapper.insert: insert into interview (interview_id, user_id, company_name, address, time, status, suggestion, comment) values (#{interviewId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suggestion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update interview
